query.statement: SELECT CS301_TEM || '-' || CS301_RDT || '-' || CS301_SEQ ETN, CS301_SIR SIR, CS301_PST PST, CASE CS301_PST WHEN 'A1' THEN '작성' WHEN 'A2' THEN '반송' WHEN 'A3' THEN '전송' WHEN 'A6' THEN '승인' END PST_NM, CS301_MDT MDT, CS301_MID MID, ( SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = CS301_MID ) MID_NM, CS301_CDT CDT, CS301_NAM NAM, CS301_SPT SPT, CS301_PJT PJT, CS301_ADR ADR, CS301_SPC SPC, CS301_PRD PRD, CS301_CDY CDY, CS301_CPD CPD, CS301_CND CND, CS301_SRG SRG, CS301_GBU GBU, CS301_YGB YGB, CS301_BLD BLD, CS301_PDT PDT, CS301_CNT CNT, CS301_FLR FLR, CS301_SPD SPD, CS301_SYR SYR, CS301_HYN HYN, CS301_DYN DYN, CS301_CYN CYN, CS301_RM1||CS301_RM2 RMK, '' APSTAT, '' MASTAT, 0 MATOT, CS301_STD AS STD , CS301_ETD AS ETD , CS301_ZMAN AS ZMAN , CS301_PNT AS PNT , CS301_SAJ AS SAJ , CS301_GIS AS GIS , DECODE(CS301_BDGBN,'Y','1','') AS BDGBN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS301_TEM = #G_SAP_USER_VGCD# AND CS301_RDT = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,4) AND CS301_SEQ = ( SELECT MAX(CS301_SEQ) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS301_TEM = #G_SAP_USER_VGCD# AND CS301_RDT = SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,4) AND CS301_SIR = '01' AND CS301_PST = 'A1' AND CS301_DEL = 'N' ) AND CS301_SIR = '01' AND CS301_PST = 'A1' AND CS301_DEL = 'N' WITH UR
